Class ChainedEventConsumer

java.lang.Object
  src.java.com.infusion.util.event.chain.ChainedEventConsumer
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventConsumer
class ChainedEventConsumer

Event consumer class that listens to one event, and then re-publishes the event as another event.

You can optionally provide a tranformer to convert the event from one type to another (if the target event requires a different type of object). A transformer that returns null will cause the chaining to not occur.

protected EventTransformer eventTransformer

java.lang.String sourceEvent

protected java.lang.String targetEvent

 
Constructor Summary
ChainedEventConsumer(EventType source, EventType target)

The advantage of using this constructor is that it will verify that the events you are chaining are allowed to be chained (the target event takes in the same type of event as the source)
